question answer: Do you offer subscription services?	No
column2: we do not offer subscription services.

question answer: Can I share my order with someone else?	Yes
column2: you can share your order confirmation or tracking information with others.

question answer: What if my item arrives damaged?	If your item is damaged
column2: please contact our customer support team for a replacement.

question answer: Can I buy in bulk?	Yes
column2: we offer bulk buying options for many products. Please contact us for more details.

question answer: Can I purchase a product for resale?	Yes
column2: we allow resellers. Contact us for wholesale pricing and details.
